name: I.B.F. Pick-me-up
instruction: Place ice, Fernet Branca, Curacao, and brandy in a wineglass. Fill with Champagne, stir, and squeeze Lemon Peel on top.

name: Inca Cocktail
instruction: Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a small chunk of Pineapple.
note: Invented by H. C. Harrison when in charge at the Embassy Bar, London.

name: Ink Street Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: Named after Fleet Street, the center of the Newspaper World.

name: Irish Cocktail
instruction: Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, add an Olive, and squeeze Lemon Peel on top.
